Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Groveler \Grov"el*er\, n. One who grovels; an abject wretch. [Written also --groveller.] [1913 Webster]
groveler n : someone who humbles himself as a sign of respect; who behaves as if he had no self-respect [syn: {apple polisher}, {bootlicker}, {fawner}, {groveller}, {truckler}, {ass-kisser}]
